utils.Slogan: No caffeine, no chaos. Just clean code.
Full flavor, no jitters. That's Decaf-TS.
Chill fullstack. Powered by Decaf.
Decaf-TS: Brewed for calm code.
Smooth as your morning Decaf.
All the kick, none of the crash.
Sip back and ship faster.
Keep calm and code Decaf.
Code without the caffeine shakes.
Your fullstack, decaffeinated.

Decaf-TS: Where smart contracts meet smart interfaces.
Ship dApps without the stress.
No CRUD, no problem — Decaf your data.
From DID to UI, without breaking a sweat.
Decaf-TS: Your frontend already understands your smart contract.
Self-sovereign by design. Productive by default.
Build once. Deploy everywhere. Decentralized and delightful.
Data that defines its own destiny.
Goodbye CRUD, hello intent-based interfaces.
The smoothest path from DID to done.
Because your dApp deserves more than boilerplate.
Own your data. Own your flow.
Write logic like it belongs with the data — because it does.
From smart contracts to smarter frontends.
No caffeine. No CRUD. Just the future.
The future of web3 UX is Decaf.
Code with confidence. Govern with clarity.
Interfaces that obey the data, not the other way around.
Brew business logic right into your bytes.
DIDs done differently — and delightfully.

for-couchdb.Slogan: Put your data on the Couch — it deserves a break.
Decaf-TS + CouchDB: the most relaxed stack in tech.
No stress, no schema — just smooth storage.
Sit back. Your queries just got simpler.
Declarative indexes. Because you have better things to do.
Query like it’s SQL. Relax like it’s NoSQL.
Skip the CRUD. Keep the couch.
No setup. No stress. No problem.
Database queries that feel like a nap in a hammock.
Where your data chills and your dev flow soars.
Let the indexes build themselves.
CouchDB: for developers who like to lean back.
Couch mode: ON. Query mode: AUTO.
Your backend’s comfy recliner.
Sleep better knowing your queries just work.
The database that won’t keep you up at night.
No caffeine needed when your queries write themselves.
From query to chill in 0.01s.
CRUD is so last decade. Welcome to Couch mode.
Decaf + Couch = backend bliss.
Put your data on the CouchDB — it deserves a break.

for-nano.Slogan: Decaf-TS + Nano: the smallest way to connect with the chillest database.
Decaf-TS + Big things come in Nano packages.
Decaf-TS + Tiny client. Massive chill.
Decaf-TS + Connect to CouchDB, the Nano way.
Decaf-TS + Nano handles your data while you sip your coffee.
Decaf-TS + No sweat, just sync.
Decaf-TS + Nano + CouchDB = Zero config, full comfort.
Decaf-TS + Write less, rest more.
Decaf-TS + Let Nano do the lifting while you do the lounging.
Decaf-TS + Nano’s so smooth, you’ll forget it’s working.
Decaf-TS + nano: the smallest way to connect with the relaxest database.
